# **Welcome!**

I am currently a Post-Doctoral Research Associate in [Prof. Beckerman](https://www.sheffield.ac.uk/biosciences/people/academic-staff/andrew-beckerman)'s lab at the University of Sheffield, working on the UKRI-NERC project **"*Assessing and Managing the Impacts of Mixtures of Chemicals on UK Freshwater Biodiversity in a Changing World*".**

<bp>

I work at the interface of ecology and environmental science.

I focus on food web structure, biodiversity, and ecosystem functions.

I conduct field sampling to find patterns in aquatic ecosystems.

I build computational models to generate theories of how communities respond to changing environments.
